sense.name: urban area
sense.commentary: A place where people live. Smaller than a city.
sense.examples: They drive through town on their way to work. I was born in a small town.

sense.name: government administration
sense.commentary: The people in charge of a town, usually the local government.
sense.examples: The town is responsible for snow removal. I had to pay local taxes to the Town of North Hempstead. The town has passed new laws regulating speed limits.

sense.name: people in a town
sense.commentary: The collection of people who live in a town.
sense.examples: The whole town cheered when John scored a touchdown. The town gathered for the Christmas tree lighting.
